    • Uses of QueryState in org.apache.cassandra.cql3

      Methods in org.apache.cassandra.cql3 with parameters of type QueryState 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ResultMessage CQLStatement.execute(QueryState state, QueryOptions options)
      Execute the statement and return the resulting result or null if there is no result.
      ResultMessage CQLStatement.executeInternal(QueryState state)
      Variante of execute used for internal query against the system tables, and thus only query the local node.
